properties.areaDesc: Tallapoosa, AL; Chambers, AL; Elmore, AL; Randolph, AL; Macon, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 7:03AM CST until February 18 at 9:53PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tallapoosa River At Wadley Affecting Chambers...Elmore...Macon...
Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall has occurred within the past 12 hours over the
Tallapoosa River at Wadley...and a flood warning is now in effect.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Tallapoosa River At Wadley.
* until this evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 6:00 AM Tuesday The stage Was 13.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to crest soon and could
remain above flood stage through this evening.
* Impact...At 13 feet...Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs
and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if
higher stages are forecast.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
